description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Collect all of the parts needed to activate the teleporter while taking care of the aliens that have abducted you.  First person alien shooter game.  Endless levels, pickups and powerups.
description.short: Collect all of the parts needed to activate the teleporter while taking care of the aliens that have abducted you.  First person alien shooter game.  Endless levels, pickups and powerups.
